resources.string: Type in a name above and click the + to create a list!
You already have a name list named %s.
Would you like to view a very short tutorial on how to use this app? You can review it at any time by clicking the info button in the toolbar above.
To create a new name list, type its name into the bar on the left and click this button. After that, it will appear below. Click on any name list to open its edit list/choose names page.
In order to import name lists, you need to give this app access to your device\'s external files. Would you like to do that?
In order to use speech to text functionality you need to give this app access to your device\'s microphone. Would you like to do that?
This app can import name lists quickly and seamlessly from .txt files on your device (names in the files must be new-line separated). To do this, click this upload button at any time.

And that\'s it! Thank you for downloading this app; I hope it serves you well! If you need more help or have ideas on how to make this app more awesome, please use the send feedback option in the settings menu to tell me!

Hey, it looks like you\'re a frequent user of Random Name Picker! If you have a couple seconds, please rate this app in the Play Store. Every rating goes a long way towards motivating me to continue improving this app!
